property.name: border
property.description: Border for text fields. Also used for spinner widget.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for text widget.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for single-line text fields. Also used for spinner.

style.name: SINGLE
style.description: Style constant for single line text field behavior.

style.name: MULTI
style.description: Style constant for multy line text area behavior.

state.name: read-only
state.description: Applies to text fields in read-only mode.

element.name: Text-Message
element.description: The Text message. The message text is displayed as a hint for the user, indicating the purpose of the field.
